source: 记忆中端午节一直说快乐，也就最近几年忽然流行安康其实说啥都无所谓反正是祝福的意思，但好像说“快乐”就显得没文化似的，劳春燕居然煞有介事地科普起来我猜“安康”一词看起来文绉绉一些，假文人就生拉硬扯，她刚开始做短视频“你会读书吗吗”、“这样读书全错了”把我吓滴一愣一愣滴 查看图片。
target: In my memory, the Dragon Boat Festival has always said "happy", but suddenly, it has become popular to say "healthy" recently. It seems that saying "happy" is not cultured, but Lv Chunyan is very serious in introducing this. I guess that "healthy" looks more refined than "happy", so the fake culture people are trying to find reasons to twist it. She started to make short videos, "Do you read books?" and "read books the wrong way". I was shocked and confused.

target: Speaking to her face to face, I always doubt whether I have something to owe her or something to be owed by her! 'Luan teacher's feelings I took as a joke and told my wife when I got home. My wife said that the couple next door are indeed self-righteous, with their faces always gloomy, and they never have a good mood. target: The students feared that they had not followed the monk's teachings well enough: "When you have no desire for anything, you are free. " "Do you think you can control your body? You can't control anything else, can you? " The old monk has long been eating only one meal a day, teaching his students to practice Buddhism.

### Idiom: 困兽犹斗
### Meaning: 被围困的野兽仍然搏斗。比喻处于绝境仍作竭力挣扎。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 封敕文预先设置重兵在壕沟外拦击，战斗从夜里一直打到次日早晨。封敕文与众将士商议说：“困兽犹斗，何况是人。叛军知道他们没有生路，同我们拼死对抗，一定会伤害我们的将士，我们不容易平定他们。
target: The imperial edict had预先 set up strong troops outside the trenches to intercept, and the battle lasted from night to the next morning. The imperial edict discussed with the officers and soldiers: "Even wild animals fight to the end, let alone people. The rebels know they have no way out, and they will fight to the death with us, which will definitely hurt our officers and soldiers. We will find it difficult to pacify them."

target: Sometimes it's hard, cold and complex. Sometimes it builds a mental model of the universe; flecks of energy traveling across vast, empty spaces. Sometimes it calls these spots "electrons" and "protons."

### Idiom: 群雄逐鹿
### Meaning: 群雄旧指许多有军事势力的人。逐鹿比喻争夺帝王之位。形容各派势力争夺最高统治地位。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: web
source: 《三国演义》可大致分为黄巾起义、董卓之乱、群雄逐鹿、三国鼎立、三国归晋五大部分，描写了从东汉末年到西晋初年之间近百年的历史风云，以描写战争为主，诉说了东汉末年的群雄割据混战和魏、蜀、吴三国之间的政治和军事斗争，最终司马炎一统三国，建立晋朝的故事。该作品成书后有嘉靖壬午本等多个版本传于世，到了明末清初，毛宗岗对《三国演义》整顿回目、修正文辞、改换诗文，该版本也成为诸多版本中水平最高、流传最广的版本。
target: "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms" can be roughly divided into five parts: the Yellow Turban Uprising, Dong Zhuo's Rebellion, the Heroes' Competition, the Three Kingdoms' Triarchy, and the Three Kingdoms' Return to Jin. It describes the historical events of nearly a hundred years from the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty to the early years of the Western Jin Dynasty, mainly describing wars. It tells the story of the war between the heroes in the late Eastern Han Dynasty and the political and military struggles among the three kingdoms of Wei, Shu and Wu. In the end, Sima Yan unified the three kingdoms and established the Jin Dynasty. After the work was written, many versions including the Jiajing Renwu version were handed down to the world. At the end of the Ming Dynasty and the beginning of the Qing Dynasty, Mao Zonggang reorganized "The Romance of the Three Kingdoms", revised the diction, and changed the poems. This version has become the highest level and most popular among the many versions. The widest version.

### Idiom: 听而不闻
### Meaning: ①《礼记·大学》：“心不在焉，视而不见，听而不闻，食而不知其味。”后以“听而不闻”谓听了与没听见一样，形容不重视或漠不关心。②谓听力有限，不闻声响。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 马林其后向传媒证实照片在其总理官邸拍摄，并为此道歉。她谴责中共当局侵犯新疆维吾尔人权，指利益不是对暴行听而不闻的藉口；认为乌克兰回复和平的唯一方法是令俄罗斯全面撤军，欧盟也因此应摆脱对后者石油的依赖。虽然支持芬兰加入北约，但认为国土上不应有北约永久基地甚至核武的布置。
target: Marini subsequently confirmed to the media that the photo was taken at her official residence as prime minister and apologized for it. She condemned the Chinese Communist Party for violating the human rights of the Uighurs in Xinjiang, saying that interests should not be an excuse for turning a blind eye to atrocities; she believed that the only way to restore peace in Ukraine was to completely withdraw Russian troops, and the EU should therefore break its dependence on Russian oil. Although she supports Finland joining NATO, she believes that there should be no permanent NATO bases or even nuclear weapons deployed on its territory.

### Idiom: 项庄舞剑

**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 并强调演习要有随时可投入战斗的‘今夜就战’的临战演练。这场美韩联合军演，表面上的假想敌是北韩，但是，鉴于演习地点紧逼辽东半岛和山东半岛，距离北京也还不到1000公里，势必造成中国有‘项庄舞剑，意在沛公’的威胁感。
target: And stress the exercises should have 'ready to fight tonight' wartime drills. This US and South Korea joint military exercise, the ostensible imaginary enemy is North Korea, but considering the location of the exercises is close to the Liaodong Peninsula and Shandong Peninsula, and is less than 1000 kilometers away from Beijing, it is bound to cause China to feel threatened, as if 'Xiangzhuang dances with a sword, aiming at沛公'.

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 但是我在敏感多疑的同时又很容易获得短暂的满足，经常会因为一些小事，即使是一句话就觉得他好爱我。可是事实上每一个突然袭击我大脑的过往的瞬间又会敲击的我陷入沉思——他真的有他所说的、有我短暂感觉到的那么在乎我吗？。
target: But I'm sensitive and suspicious at the same time, so it's easy to get a temporary satisfaction, but I often feel that he loves me because of some small things, even a sentence. But in fact, every time the past suddenly attacks my brain, I will think about it, and I will be thoughtful - is he really as concerned about me as he said?

target: Tell my fellow earthlings that the enemy has neither invincible sharpness nor invincible gods, but I have a heroic military spirit that will fight to the end, so that I can calm my fellow earthlings who are still alive, and comfort those who are dead.

Therefore, it is a lie to say that freedom of speech in Hong Kong has been suppressed. Can't it be called restricting freedom of speech to restrict incitement to murder and arson, robbery and theft? Secretary for Justice Lam Ting-kwok.外界指有大量涉及示威案件的被告，在等候审讯期间不得保释。For defendants involved in a large number of demonstration cases, they are not allowed bail during the waiting period for trial.

### Idiom: 此地无银三百两
### Meaning: 比喻想要隐瞒掩饰，结果反而暴露。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: wikipedia
source: “汉奸”两字始现于清朝，根据日本神户大学教授王柯的考证，雍正年间，曾有汉人与“苗顽”联手对抗清廷在西南边疆的“改土归流”政策，这些人被骂为“汉奸”。事实上，此一名词为满人首创，基本目的即是“此地无银三百两”银三百两，原因在于自己是满人，所污蔑为汉奸者，其实是“满奸”，真实意义是背叛满清皇室者。清代史料中最早使用“汉奸”一词是康熙年间贵州巡抚田雯的《古欢堂集·黔书》：苗盗之患，起于汉奸。
target: The word "traitor" first appeared in the Qing Dynasty. According to research by Wang Ke, a professor at Kobe University in Japan, during the Yongzheng period, Han Chinese and "Miao stubborn" teamed up to resist the Qing government's policy of "returning native land and returning home" in the southwest frontier. These people were Called "traitor". In fact, this term was first coined by the Manchus. The basic purpose is "there is no three hundred taels of silver here". The reason is that I am a Manchu, and those who are slandered as traitors are actually "Manchu traitors". The true meaning is He was a traitor to the Manchu royal family. The earliest use of the word "traitor" in historical materials of the Qing Dynasty was in the "Gu Huantang Ji Qian Shu" written by Tian Wen, the governor of Guizhou during the Kangxi period: the problem of Miao bandits originated from traitors.

context:
### Idiom: 瞒上不瞒下
### Meaning: 瞒也作漫”，欺骗，蒙蔽。瞒着上面，不瞒下面。指通同作弊，不使上级知道。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: “外面工作”主要是在两军驻防交接地带“利用我们的宣传品、喊话、谈话、联欢、慰劳、演剧等等方式，去影响东北军”，中共中央明确要求改变先前那种标语口号式的“高谈阔论使人厌烦的宣传”，要多多利用演剧等“普遍深入、通俗简明”的宣传鼓动方法。要“加紧最有把握方面的下层官兵工作”，使用各种文艺形式，“动员所有的我们的战斗员、游击队员、赤少队员、机关工作人员，同他们中下级官兵举行谈话、宣传、联欢、唱歌、演戏，把他们当作自家人，同他们各单位甚至一连、一排、一班进行瞒上不瞒下的协商，敷衍上级进攻命令，……这样把六十七军从政治上转变为可靠的抗日军”“内面工作”就是在东北军中建立中共党组织为基础“在东北军中创立坚强的领导的核心”，从而“使东北军的下层官兵在抗日救国的政治目标下团结起来，给东北军造成一个坚强的下层基础与推动的力量”，推动高级将领乃至于整个东北军成为抗日友军。周恩来亲自指导中央东北军工作委员会成立东北军工作干部训练班，并把在劳山战役、榆林桥战役、直罗镇战役中俘虏的东北军3个师的中下级军官120余人，集中在瓦窑堡开办学习班（即“白军军官连”），毛泽东、博古、邓颖超、彭德怀等中央领导亲自讲课，发路费送回东北军。
target: “Outside work” mainly means “using our propaganda, slogans, speeches, talks, entertainment, relief, and drama to influence the Northeastern Army”, and the Communist Party of China clearly requires us to change the previous propaganda style of “high-sounding rhetoric that is despised and tired of”, and to use various forms of art to “mobilize all our combatants, guerrillas, Red Army members, and administrative staff, and hold talks, propaganda, entertainments, and drama with them, so that they will be like our own people, and negotiate with them without concealing anything from their superiors,……so that the 67th Army can be transformed politically into a reliable anti-Japanese army” “Inside work” is to build the Communist Party organization as the foundation “to create a strong leadership core in the Northeastern Army” so that “the lower-ranking officers and soldiers in the Northeastern Army will unite under the political goal of resisting Japan and saving the country”, and drive the senior officers and even the entire Northeastern Army to become anti-Japan allies. Zhou Enlai personally guided the establishment of the East Northeastern Army Work Committee, and sent the 120 or so middle and lower-ranking officers of the 3rd Division of the Northeastern Army, who were captured in the Laowangzhan Battle, Lutou Bridge Battle, and Zhuolu Town Battle, to the white officers’ school in Wafangdian (that is, “the white officers’ school”). Mao Zedong, Bo Gu, Deng Xiaoping, and Song Qingling personally lectured there, and sent transportation fees to the Northeastern Army.

### Idiom: 烘云托月
### Meaning: 烘渲染；托衬托。原指一种画月亮的传统手法◇比喻从侧面渲染以显示或突出主体。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: web
source: 而文章气盛的道理，也就不难理解了。与此同时，作者也写了另一方面，如“四君”“九国之师”“六国之士”等等，愈写对方也就愈反衬秦之强大，这是烘云托月的手法。前三段，主要写三个方面：一、秦国世世代代有野心；二、秦国实力愈来愈强大；三、由于靠实力，秦国统一天下并不很难。
target: As a result, the author's arrogance can be understandable, while writing on the other side, such as "Four Kings", "Nine Nations Teachers", "Six Nations Men", etc., he always goes to the against side to counteract the strength of the ancient 秦, this is a technique of making a false comparison. The first three chapters, mainly relate three things: one, the ambition of the ancient 秦, the strength of the ancient 秦, and three, the power of the ancient 秦, the authority of the ancient 秦.

### Idiom: 惊耳骇目
### Meaning: 耳闻目见后内心震惊。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 王昌龄文学创作论以“意”为中心，也是借鉴佛教“意”和“意识”的观念。王昌龄受推许为“七绝圣手”，唐代殷璠赞许王昌龄真正能继承建安风骨，“惊耳骇目”，是东晋以后几百年间内振起颓势的“中兴之作”，认可王昌龄与储光羲可与曹植、谢灵运并驾齐驱。晚唐时流行的一部说诗杂著《琉璃堂墨客图》，尊称王昌龄为“诗天子”。
target: The literary creation theory of Wang Changling centers on the concept of "yì" and also draws upon the concepts of "yì" and "consciousness" of Buddhism. Wang Changling was hailed as the "saintly hand of the Seven-character verse" by the Tang Dynasty Yin Zheng, and was recognized as the "revival of the spirit of Jianan" by Yin Zheng, "shocking and frightening" and "the work of restoration" during the period of the decline of the Eastern Jin Dynasty, which was the "restoration of the spirit of the revival" and was compared with Chu Guangxi and Xie Lingyun. In the late Tang Dynasty, the literary collection "A Treatise on Poetry" was popular, and Wang Changling was hailed as the "poet king".

### Idiom: 不知就里
### Meaning: 不了解内情。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 在体力、时间及Budget均相当有限的情况下，Arthur与行仔的8天行程依然丰富，玩匀海陆空之余，更在制作组安排下，卖港式鸡蛋仔赚盘川，行仔全程豁出去大声叫卖，Arthur则贯彻‘迷男郎’本色迷失到底。今明播放的头两集，出发时喜气洋洋的Arthur和行仔，甫落机即被制作组强行‘开始拍摄’，完全不知就里的二人，在没有剧本及任何资讯的情况下，开始了为期8天的‘丧行’之旅。2人首个任务挑战‘豪华海景野餐’，单是寻找合适景点及食物已行到脚酸，其间更遇上猴子小偷将2人辛苦得来的驰名鸭肉‘毁掉’，令他们要‘返回起点重新出发’。
target: With limited physical strength, time and budget, Arthur and Xing Zai's 8-day itinerary was still rich. In addition to enjoying the sea, land and air, under the arrangement of the production team, they also sold Hong Kong-style egg waffles to make a lot of money. He risked his life and hawked loudly, while Arthur stayed true to his true nature of being a "fascinating boy" and lost himself to the end. In the first two episodes aired today, Arthur and Xing Zai, who were very happy when they set off, were forced to 'start filming' by the production team as soon as they landed. The two people, completely unaware of what was going on, began a period of filming without a script or any information. An 8-day 'mourning trip'. The first task for the two was to challenge the 'Luxury Sea View Picnic'. They were exhausted just looking for suitable attractions and food. During the process, they even encountered a monkey thief who 'destroyed' the famous duck meat that the two had worked so hard for, making them want to Return to the starting point and start again'.

context:
### Idiom: 盛衰荣辱
### Meaning: 兴盛、衰败、荣耀、耻辱。指人事变化发展的各种情况。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 前总统马英九日前以祭祖名义前往中国大陆访问12天，并且参访抗战遗址和纪念设施，当他赴湖南衡山‘南岳忠烈祠’祭拜时，也意外让台湾民众发现，原来对岸也有一座‘忠烈祠’。而且‘南岳忠烈祠’还曾经是‘国家级’的忠烈祠，当国民政府即将退守台湾之际，中枢最后一次的国殇大典是在这里举办，也曾经被人为毁坏3次，可以说是看尽中华民国在大陆时期的盛衰荣辱。七七卢沟桥事变爆发，日军全面侵华，历经淞沪会战、南京保卫战、徐州会战到武汉会战之后，中国半壁江山，也就是最精华地区，已落入日军敌手，然而蒋中正没有屈服，将国民政府迁至重庆继续抗战，中日两军开始进入相持阶段。
target: Former President Ma Ying-jeou recently visited mainland China for 12 days in the name of ancestor worship and visited Anti-Japanese War sites and memorial facilities. When he went to worship at the Nanyue Martyrs' Shrine in Hengshan, Hunan, the Taiwanese people unexpectedly discovered that there was also a 'Martyrs' Shrine' on the other side of the river. Martyrs' Shrine'. Moreover, the 'Nanyue Martyrs' Shrine' was once a 'national' Martyrs' Shrine. When the Nationalist Government was about to retreat to Taiwan, the Central Committee's last national memorial ceremony was held here. It was also vandalized three times. It can be said that it is a sight to see. The rise and fall of the Republic of China in the mainland period. The Marco Polo Bridge Incident broke out on July 7th, and the Japanese army invaded China in an all-out manner. After the Battle of Songhu, the Battle of Nanjing, the Battle of Xuzhou and the Battle of Wuhan, half of China, the most elite areas, had fallen into the hands of the Japanese enemies. However, Chiang Kai-shek did not give in and conquered the people. The government moved to Chongqing to continue the war of resistance, and the Chinese and Japanese armies began to enter a stalemate stage.

### Idiom: 无相无作
### Meaning: ①佛教语。指弃绝众相，不事造作。②泛指不务空言。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by gpt4; Corpus: weibo
source: 初发心菩萨名之为住…若有菩萨初发心者。修行于空无相无作。解一切法无生无灭。
target: The initial intention of a Bodhisattva is called dwelling... If a Bodhisattva has an initial intention, they practice in emptiness, without form or action, understanding that all phenomena are neither created nor destroyed.

context:
### Idiom: 群雄逐鹿
### Meaning: 群雄旧指许多有军事势力的人。逐鹿比喻争夺帝王之位。形容各派势力争夺最高统治地位。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: web
source: 惠达卫浴在上交所鸣锣上市。因此，中国卫浴行业龙头老大的位置，自然引起群雄逐鹿，不少企业纷纷上市，以期打破这一局面。背景。
target: Huida Sanitary Ware has sounded the bell on the Shanghai Stock Exchange. Therefore, the position of the leader of the Chinese sanitary ware industry has naturally attracted the pursuit of many strong players, and many enterprises have listed in an attempt to break this situation. Background.

context:
### Idiom: 见所未见
### Meaning: 见到从来没有看到过的。形容事物十分希罕。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: wikipedia
source: 当时宁夏省会、西夏故都银川附近的贺兰山发生了洪灾，这些钱币借此重见天日。出土钱币中有汉、唐、宋、辽、金等很多朝代的货币，其中辽金钱币此前鲜见，篆书“光定元宝”更是见所未见。这枚篆书“光定元宝”钱直径25.3mm，厚1.4mm，重4.3g。
target: A flood in Helan Mountain near Yinchuan, the provincial capital of Ningxia and the ancient capital of Western Xia, led to the rediscovery of these coins. Among the unearthed coins were those from many dynasties, such as Han, Tang, Song, Liao, Jin, etc. The Liao Jinyi coins were particularly rare, and the篆书 "Guangding Yuanshi" was even unseen before. This "Guangding Yuanshi" coin has a diameter of 25.3mm, a thickness of 1.4mm, and a weight of 4.3g.

context:
### Idiom: 目迷五色
### Meaning: 五色各种颜色。形容颜色既多又杂，因而看不清。比喻事物措综复杂，不易分辨清楚。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by google_api; Corpus: cc-news
source: 去年的二十大报告则强调：没有文化自信，就没有中华民族伟大复兴。黄河九曲，由‘反传统’曲折地走到想立足传统、了解传统、并进而以文化传统建设出‘中国式现代化’，转折这么多这么大，外界当然也看得目迷五色。因为它既反对以文明之名强推西方式制度，又彰显中国特色的社会主义要有中国传统文化内容。
target: Last year's 20th National Congress report emphasized that without cultural confidence, there will be no great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. The Nine Bends of the Yellow River have gone from being 'anti-traditional' to wanting to base oneself on tradition, understand tradition, and then use cultural traditions to build 'Chinese-style modernization'. There are so many twists and turns, and the outside world is of course fascinated by them. Because it not only opposes the imposition of Western systems in the name of civilization, but also demonstrates that socialism with Chinese characteristics must have Chinese traditional cultural content.

### Idiom: 自寻烦恼
### Meaning: 自找的烦闷苦恼。意思是，本来不该有烦闷苦恼。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by qwen-14b-chat; Corpus: cc-news
source: 另一半有时需要一个人安静地思考，此时你不必过多打扰，问得太多只会自寻烦恼。
target: The other half sometimes needs to be alone to think, at this time you don't need to disturb too much, asking too much will only bring yourself trouble.

context:
### Idiom: 胸中万卷
### Meaning: 指读过大量的书。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by alma-13b-lora; Corpus: weibo
source: 今天背诵的是苏轼的《沁园春》“孤馆灯青”。佳句是“世路无穷，劳生有限”，“有笔头千字，胸中万卷”，“身长健，但优游卒岁”。苏轼写给弟弟苏辙格外好的诗词，除了脍炙人口的《水调歌头》“明月几时有”，还有《和子由渑池怀旧》“人生到处知何似，应似飞鸿踏雪泥。
target: Today, we are reciting Su Shi's "Lonely Pavilion in Spring". The best lines are "The world is boundless, but our life is limited", "I have a pen, but I have a thousand words", and "I am old, but I am in my prime". Su Shi wrote many good poems to his younger brother Su Yin, besides the well-known "Moon in the Southern Sky" "When will the moon rise?", there is also "Love in the memory of childhood from Huo Chi Lake" "Life is like a bird flying, but it is just like a bird walking on the snow".

context:
### Idiom: 无往不胜
### Meaning: 无论到哪儿没有不胜利的。
**The meaning above is for reference. You should look up the meaning of the idiom when uncertain.**

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: weibo
source: “告我地球同胞，敌人没有无往不胜的锋锐，并非无可战胜之神，但有我浩然军魂一息尚存，必与这些数典忘祖之辈血战到底，以安我同胞生者之心，慰我同胞死者之灵。” “我等愿身化飞灰，扬于百万星河。
target: "To my Earth brothers, enemy does not have a never-ending sharp edge, nor is he a formidable god, but I will fight at the last with these forgetful heroes to the end of my life, to bring peace to the hearts of my brothers, and to the souls of my brothers' dead."

target: The Eurozone may have already avoided a life-and-death crisis, but problems will still exist before the details of the aid plan are announced.

Translated by mt0-13b; Corpus: cc-news
source: 水瓶座：好人有好报，热心助人，有助收获好人缘。双鱼座：没必要跟别人作比较，跟自寻烦恼没分别。
target: Aquarius: Good deeds shall be rewarded, generous giving will help you gain good relationships. Aquarius: No need to compare yourself to others, no difference from finding your own trouble.
